name: Val Tannen
content: Val Tannen's Home Page Val Tannen's Home Page Address: Val Tannen Department of Computer and Information Science University of Pennsylvania 3330 Walnut Street Philadelphia, Pennsylvania 19104 Email: val@cis.upenn.edu Office: Levine North 570 Tel: +1 (215) 898-2665 FAX: +1 (215) 898-0587 Spring 2023 teaching: CIS 1600 interactive sessions (Sec001 TR 10:15-11:45 | Sec002 TR 13:45-15:15) both in Skirkanich Aud. Office hours: by appointment, also TBA for important course milestones. Research groups: Databases , Logic and Computation. Most of my publications (DBLP) Fellow of the ACM and Member of Academia Europaea Slides for the EDBT 2010 Keynote "Provenance for Database Transformations" [.pdf] Slides for the PODS 2017 Test of Time Award/Gems of PODS talk "The Semiring Framework for Database Provenance" [.pdf] A. and N. Tannen's reaction to being told that a monad on C is nothing else but a monoid in the monoidal category of endofunctors C->C. Le doute est un état mental désagréable, mais la certitude est ridicule. ________________________________ Val Tannen (val@cis.upenn.edu)
